full_description:
ViewSonic M1+_G2 300 Lumens Smart LED Built-in Wi-Fi Portable Android Projector

The ViewSonic M1+ is an ultra-portable WVGA LED projector that delivers convenient entertainment in nearly any room. With a built-in battery and over 30,000 hours of operational life, this projector will deliver years of multimedia entertainment wherever it goes. Weighing less than two pounds, the M1+â€™s compact and lightweight design makes it ideal for moving from room to room, or for indoor/ outdoor usage. An integrated smart stand provides for simple 360-degree setup, while also doubling as a lens cover. Once the lens is uncovered, the projector automatically powers on with full brightness for instant entertainment. The lens also includes a safety auto-off feature that powers down the projector when objects are detected too close to the lens. Dual Harman Kardon Bluetooth speakers provide crisp and clear sound for multimedia content, while a short throw lens can display large images in small spaces. Versatile connectivity options include a MicroSD card slot, USB Type-A and USB Type-C. What's more, integrated smart Wi-Fi connectivity lets you stream and binge from your favorite content providers like YouTube â€“ making the M1+ a great option for sharing and displaying videos and other multimedia content.

full_description:
ViewSonic PA503XE 4000 Lumens XGA Business Projector

The ViewSonic PA503XE provides exceptional visual performance for presentations and is suited for usage in small corporate meeting rooms and schools. With 4,000 ANSI Lumens of brightness and a 22,000:1 contrast ratio, this projector will portray the finest details regardless of ambient illumination. ViewSonic's SuperColor™ technology enhances color accuracy and expands the displayable color spectrum for projected pictures. Users can pick one of five color settings, including regular, brightest, presentation, photo, and movie mode, according on their usage circumstances. Furthermore, the energy-saving SuperEco mode of the PA503XE minimizes power usage and increases bulb life by up to 15,000 hours.

Extended Lifespan

Users can pick a different lamp mode to increase the lamp's longevity. When the Power Saving option is enabled and there is no signal input, the ViewSonic PA503XE projector will automatically transition to Eco Mode and SuperEco Mode. When this projector is left inactive for 5 minutes in Eco Mode, it switches from Normal to Eco Mode automatically. When the projector does not receive an input signal for 20 minutes, projected pictures are dimmed to 70%, prolonging the lamp's average life to 15,000 hours in SuperEco Mode.

Automatic Sleep Timer

It is typical to forget to turn off projectors, particularly in public areas like schools and conference rooms. The PA503XE has sleep timer allows you to set a period of inactivity during which the projector will automatically enter sleep mode.

Bright Images in Any Environment

3,500 ANSI Lumens of brightness and a 22,000:1 high contrast ratio ensure brilliant pictures in any setting, including spaces with high ambient light with ViewSonic PA503XE projector.

ViewSonic PG603X 3,800 Lumens XGA Business DLP Projector

The ViewSonic PG603X XGA networkable projector features 3,800 lumens, XGA 1024x768 native resolution, an intuitive, user-friendly design and a sleek white chassis. Exclusive SuperColor technology offers a wide color gamut for beautiful image production in nearly any environment, while SonicMode sound enhancement technology powers a 10W speaker for incredibly clear and audible sound. An energy-saving SuperEco feature reduces power consumption and extends the lamp life by up to 15,000 hours. An integrated USB A reader port, and optional WiiFi (PJ-WPD-200 wireless dongle sold separately) deliver flexible content streaming and wireless presentation options. Equipped with CrestronÂ® LAN controller, this projector makes it easy for IT admin to remotely control and manage multiple projectors from their workstations. With horizontal and vertical keystone correction, 4 corner adjustments, and extensive connectivity, this projector provides for flexible and quick set-ups, and is the ideal projector for use in education and business environments.

SUPERCOLOR: AMAZING COLOR ACCURACY

ViewSonicâ€™s proprietary SuperColorâ„¢ Technology features an exclusive 6-segment color wheel and dynamic lamp control capabilities, providing a wide color range and stunningly beautiful images.

Packed with 3,800 lumens and a high contrast ratio, this projector produces bright images in nearly any environment.

NETWORK MONITORING & CONTROL

IT admin can monitor, schedule, and manage the projector remotely, as well as receive projector status alerts, with the integrated CrestronÂ® e-Controlâ„¢ system and RoomView Expressâ„¢ management software. Because this projector is CrestronÂ® and AMXÂ® certified, IT admin can control and monitor the projector for any size campus or enterprise.

USB READER AND USB DISPLAY

Deliver your presentations using a quick, simple plug-and-play USB connection without running a bulky connection cable. Using the built-in USB reader you can display photos, Microsoft Office files, and PDFs, directly from a USB flash drive.

WIFI AND LAN DISPLAY

With its advanced networking capability, this projector can project images via wireless, or wired, LAN. The LAN display offers a quad split screen for simultaneously projecting content from up to 4 PCs, with the ability to broadcast from up to 8 projectors. The PJ-WPD-200 wireless adapter (sold separately) is required for wireless display.

ENERGY-EFFICIENT SUPERECO

SuperEco mode allows users to dim projection brightness by up to 70%, thereby reducing the lamp's power consumptionâ€”a great energy-saving design that lowers the total cost of ownership (TCO).

BALANCED COLOR AND BRIGHTNESS

A choice of 5 unique view modes provide the best possible viewing experience in any environment regardless of ambient light.

DUAL 3D BLU-RAY READY HDMI INPUTS

Designed with two HDMI ports, this projector is perfect for connecting to any HDMI-enabled device, and can display 3D images directly from 3D Blu-ray players. 3D images can be viewed with optional ViewSonic PGD-350 Shutter Glasses, or any other compatible 3D glasses.

PROGRAMMABLE REMOTE CONTROL

A programmable hotkey â€œMyButtonâ€� can be configured to launch the most commonly used functions. Control up to eight projectors in the same venue or from a mobile device via free V-remote app.

ViewSonic PS502X 4000 ANSI Lumens XGA Short Throw Projector

The ViewSonic PS502X Short Throw Projector is a high-performance projection system that provides excellent image quality and versatility. It has a 0.55" XGA projection system with a native resolution of 1024x768, which ensures bright and vibrant images even in well-lit areas. It also provides clean and clear visuals with a brightness of 4000 ANSI lumens. With a contrast ratio of 15000:1 in SuperEco Mode and compatibility for 1.07 billion colors, the ViewSonic PS502X XGA Short Throw Projector provides amazing color accuracy and depth for a captivating visual experience. With a lamp life of up to 4000 hours in Normal Mode and 12000 hours in SuperEco Mode, it uses a 240W UHP lamp for long-lasting performance. With a throw ratio of 0.616 and a short throw lens, the ViewSonic PS502X XGA Short Throw Projector can accommodate huge screen sizes up to 300" and throw lengths between 0.75 and 3.76 meters. Two HDMI ports, VGA, audio in/out, USB Type A for power, and RS232 for simple device integration are among the practical connectivity choices it provides. With a 16-watt built-in speaker and low audible noise levels of 34 dB in normal mode and 25 dB in eco mode, the ViewSonic PS502X XGA Short Throw Projector ensures silent operation while delivering immersive audio. For flexible installation, the ViewSonic PS502X XGA Short Throw Projector also includes adaptable image modification capabilities like digital zoom and keystone correction.

ViewSonic M2e 1000 Lumens Smart Built-in Wi-Fi 1080p Portable Android Mini Projector

The ViewSonic M2e is a 1000-Lumen Full HD Smart DLP Projector. Its 1000 lumens of brightness can produce images up to 100" diagonal in moderately lit rooms, and it's compact. Enjoy a crystal-clear image no matter where you place your projector. The M2e has dual 3W Harman Kardon speakers built-in to eliminate the need for external speakers, simplifying its ease of transport and setup. ViewSonic Cinema SuperColor+ technology delivers 125% of Rec.709 color accuracy and HDR content support that produce incredibly vivid and lifelike colors for a fuller, more immersive viewing experience. Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity is built-in, so you can stream from your compatible phone or tablet. Bluetooth connectivity also allows pairing with compatible headphones or speakers for added versatility. This projector uses solid-state LED technology that is free of mercury, lamps, and filters. The LED light source provides up to 30,000 hours of usage while consuming less than half the power of a typical LCD TV, thereby lowering your total cost of ownership. Its lightweight design allows it to be easily carried around. A tripod mount on the bottom allows for a quick, easy setup at trade shows, conferences, classrooms, and more. It has a 1-year warranty.

full_description:
ViewSonic LS740W 5000 Lumens WXGA Laser Projector

The LS740W is part of ViewSonic's Luminous Superior series, a line of lamp-free, high-brightness projectors suited for business and educational environments. It uses third-generation laser phosphor technology to generate 5,000 ANSI Lumens for up to 30,000 hours, delivering brilliant and vivid visuals without the need for bulb maintenance. The lamp-free design is both environmentally friendly and cost-effective, and the projector's lightweight and small form minimizes transportation expenses. It is ideal for boardrooms, lecture halls, and public places, with projection capabilities of up to 300 inches and a high native contrast level. This projector includes a 1.3x optical zoom, H/V keystone, 4 corner adjustment, 360° projection, and a portrait mode for simple setup and diverse use.

Bright, Compact & Durable

The ViewSonic LS740W uses innovative 3rd-generation laser phosphor technology to increase brightness by 20% and improve luminous efficiency, all while being 32% more compact and accessible than the previous version. Its lamp-free light source provides rapid power on/off and has a maintenance-free lifespan of up to 30,000 hours, maintaining consistent image quality even over long periods of operation.

High Native Contrast Ratio

The ViewSonic LS740W projector has high natural contrast ratio, obtained by its Texas Instruments 0.65" DMD chip, allows for deeper blacks and brighter whites. As a consequence, it provides greater visual depth, sharper pictures, and improved readability.

Easy and Cost-effective Installation

The ViewSonic LS740W projector is 35% less in weight and 35% smaller in size than its predecessor and most competitive projectors on the market, thus lowering shipping costs and enhancing installation convenience.​

full_description:
ViewSonic PG603W 3,600 Lumens WXGA Business DLP Projector

The ViewSonic PG603W WXGA networkable projector features 3,600 lumens, WXGA 1280x800 native resolution, an intuitive, user-friendly design, and a sleek white chassis. Exclusive SuperColor technology offers a wide color gamut for beautiful image production in nearly any environment, while SonicMode sound enhancement technology powers a 10W speaker for incredibly clear and audible sound. An energy-saving SuperEco feature reduces power consumption and extends the lamp life by up to 15,000 hours. An integrated USB A reader port, and optional WiFi (PJ-WPD-200 wireless dongle sold separately) deliver flexible content streaming and wireless presentation options. Equipped with CrestronÂ® LAN controller, this projector makes it easy for IT admin to remotely control and manage multiple projectors from their workstations. With horizontal and vertical keystone correction, 4 corner adjustments, and extensive connectivity, this projector provides for flexible and quick set-ups, and is the ideal projector for use in education and business environments.

SUPERCOLOR: AMAZING COLOR ACCURACY

ViewSonicâ€™s proprietary SuperColor Technology features an exclusive 6-segment color wheel and dynamic lamp control capabilities, providing a wide color range and stunningly beautiful images.

BRIGHT IMAGES IN ANY ENVIRONMENT

Packed with 3,600 lumens and a high contrast ratio, this projector produces bright images in nearly any environment.

NETWORK MONITORING & CONTROL

IT admin can monitor, schedule, and manage the projector remotely, as well as receive projector status alerts, with the integrated Crestron e-Control system and RoomView Express management software. Because this projector is Crestron and AMXÂ® certified, IT admin can control and monitor the projector for any size campus or enterprise.

USB READER AND USB DISPLAY

Deliver your presentations using a quick, simple plug-and-play USB connection without running a bulky connection cable. Using the built-in USB reader you can display photos, Microsoft Office files, and PDFs, directly from a USB flash drive.

WIFI AND LAN DISPLAY

With its advanced networking capability, this projector can project images via wireless, or wired, LAN. The LAN display offers a quad split screen for simultaneously projecting content from up to 4 PCs, with the ability to broadcast from up to 8 projectors. The PJ-WPD-200 wireless adapter (sold separately) is required for wireless display.

ENERGY-EFFICIENT SUPERECO

SuperEco mode allows users to dim projection brightness by up to 70%, thereby reducing the lamp's power consumptionâ€”a great energy-saving design that lowers the total cost of ownership (TCO).

BALANCED COLOR AND BRIGHTNESS

A choice of 5 unique view modes provide the best possible viewing experience in any environment regardless of ambient light.

DUAL 3D BLU-RAY READY HDMI INPUTS

Designed with two HDMI ports, this projector is perfect for connecting to any HDMI-enabled device, and can display 3D images directly from 3D Blu-ray players. 3D images can be viewed with optional ViewSonic PGD-350 Shutter Glasses, or any other compatible 3D glasses.

PROGRAMMABLE REMOTE CONTROL

A programmable hotkey â€œMyButtonâ€� can be configured to launch the most commonly used functions. Control up to eight projectors in the same venue or from a mobile device via free V-remote app.

Source of Long-Lasting Laser Phosphor

The ViewSonic LS850WU 5000 Lumen Laser Projector, with a laser phosphor light source that lasts up to 20,000 hours, provides long-term, nearly maintenance-free usage for a lower overall total cost of ownership.

The ViewSonic LS850WU 5000 Lumen Laser projector's inbuilt HDBT interface allows it to receive uncompressed HD video and audio over great distances using a single network cable.
